name: One Button Golems
description:
This game was made for RND Jam 2, all assets are my own except for the sounds, which are from opengameart.org.

This game can be a bit confusing. Essentially, one of the golems, whoever has the lowest number, is trying to path find to the player. All the other golems are just moving the same direction as the leader every turn, regardless of whether it'd be a good move.
